author: Eric Pincus
title: Cutting Number of Teams Would Give NBA Better Shot at Resuming
description: LOS ANGELES — How long will it take for the  NBA  to return?     "Initially, through the first week, two weeks, we were looking at more specific scenarios," Commissioner Adam Silver told TNT's    Ernie Johnson    on Monday...
content:
Mark J. Terrill/Associated Press
LOS ANGELES How long will it take for the NBA to return?
"Initially, through the first week, two weeks, we were looking at more specific scenarios," Commissioner Adam Silver told TNT's Ernie Johnson on Monday. "... What I've… [+7275 chars]
